response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and efficiency. Considering its unparalleled capabilities and benefits, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a piece that is worth more than $1,200,000, tailored to offer you significant savings. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information about the product features, specifications, or how it could benefit you specifically. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 950000}
